Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I am beginning to find time to work on the Hush DragonHead's again, I need to buy some HW in bulk and come up with a system to "image" a new Linux install with a bunch of Hush software. The goal is when you buy it, it's "plug-n-play" and you just give it some internet to sync back to 100%. It will have Hush + :SD: pre-installed

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> there will be no wallet.dat, that is created the first time you startup. We don't want to know your privkeys and never trust any kind of thing like this that comes with a pre-generated wallet.dat !!! Somebody could monitor the addresses constantly and sweep funds out at any time

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I am going to add a feature to :SD: which shows the time the wallet.dat was created in the `hushd` screen. That will make it easier for GUI users to verify the time the wallet.dat was generated, without using the command line
